why-me.title: Why me
why-me.whyMeText: I've always been fascinated by technology – from networks to software solutions. Coding provides the ideal challenge: analyzing problems with focus, developing user-friendly solutions, and always keeping an eye on what really matters.

inputBox.subject: I am currently learning
inputBox.inputText: Show that you are motivated to continually improve your skills, implement innovative solutions and stay abreast of new technologies.

contact.headline: Let us work togehter!
contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: If you’re looking for a motivated frontend developer eager to learn and contribute to your projects, feel free to reach out! I’m excited about job opportunities, freelance work, or interesting collaborations.

message.label: Your message
message.privacyText2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

contact.descriptionText: Feel free to get in touch with job offers or opportunities such as: ... Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.

feedback.titel: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me
feedback.mobileTitel2: Here what my colleagues said about me

feedback1.text: ‘’Burak brings structure and clarity to every project. With his analytical mindset and solution-oriented approach, he has greatly supported the team. Working with him is always professional and inspiring.‘’

feedback2.text: ‘’He impresses with his creativity and technical expertise. He contributes fresh ideas and reliably translates them into clean code. With his positive attitude, he makes every teamwork efficient and enjoyable.‘’

feedback3.text: ‘’He is highly committed and approaches complex topics with great interest. His helpfulness and team spirit create an excellent working atmosphere. Through his clear communication and reliability, he has made a decisive contribution to the project.‘’

currentLearning.inputText: I’m highly motivated to continuously improve my skills, implement innovative solutions, and stay up to date with the latest technologies to create modern and efficient web applications.

EL_POLO_LOCO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
EL_POLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: Jump-and-run game inspired by classic platformers.

BULLET_POINTS.ABOUT_CONTENT: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the Chicken.
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_TITLE: How I have organised my work process
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_CONTENT: For “El Pollo Loco,” I organized my workflow by breaking down game features into distinct phases such as level design, controls, and enemy behavior. This approach helped me work systematically, prioritize tasks, and maintain a clear overview.
BULLET_POINTS.LEARNINGS_CONTENT: I especially enjoyed this project because it gave me the opportunity to dive deep into object-oriented programming with JavaScript and to strengthen my understanding of game logic and game loops.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System.

BULLET_POINTS.ABOUT_CONTENT: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_TITLE: How I have organised my work process
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_CONTENT: I organized the project with a clear module structure, meaningful naming, and thorough documentation. This keeps the code clean and maintainable, which is especially important when implementing complex game logic.
BULLET_POINTS.LEARNINGS_CONTENT: We were a team of four, and the collaboration was excellent. My main responsibility was implementing the core logic of the app, working closely with the others throughout the process.

ONGOING_PROJECT.TITLE: Ongoing Project
ONGOING_PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: Live F1 betting app using virtual coins and private friend pools.

BULLET_POINTS.ABOUT_CONTENT: An Angular app for displaying driver and constructor standings with fullcards for detailed driver information. Planned features include a race calendar, sessions, and live data.
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_TITLE: How I have organised my work process
BULLET_POINTS.WORK_PROCESS_CONTENT: Focus on clean architecture with Angular 19, RxJS, and manually maintained SCSS. I am deepening my knowledge of API integration, Firestore usage, and responsive design to deliver a high-performance portfolio project.
BULLET_POINTS.LEARNINGS_CONTENT: As part of this project, I am gaining practical experience in development with Angular 19. I work extensively with RxJS streams, Observables, and Firebase to handle data efficiently. At the same time, I am strengthening my skills in responsive design, animations, and building a well-structured frontend architecture.

PURPOSE.CONTENT: Data is processed solely for contact requests and website functionality.

STORAGE.TITLE: Storage duration
STORAGE.CONTENT: Data is stored for maximum 12 months unless legally required.
